settings.ordersreport.subject: Orders Report

settingstext.chqpayment.email: <p><style type="text/css"> body table td { font-family: Trebuchet MS; font-size: 13px; color: black; } .emailheader { font-family: Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: #656565; } .cartheader { color: white; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; background-color: #656565; } A:link, A:visited, A:active { text-decoration: underline; color: black; } A:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: #ff3300; }</style></p><p>Vous avez choisi de régler votre commande par chèque.<br />Veuillez imprimer le bon de commande ci-dessous et joignez-le à votre chèque de paiement, envoyez le tout&#160;à l'adresse ci-dessous :</p><p><strong>NB_Store Demo</strong><br />Route de la Gare<br />12150</p><p>La commande sera validée dès réception de votre courrier. Nous vous le notifierons à ce moment-là.<br />Si au-delà de cinq jours ouvrables après la commande nous n'avons toujours pas reçu votre courrier, votre commande sera automatiquement annulée.</p><p>Merci.</p><p>[Template:order.email.template]</p>

<p><style type="text/css"> body table td { font-family: Trebuchet MS; font-size: 13px; color: black; } .emailheader { font-family: Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: #656565; } .cartheader { color: white; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; background-color: #656565; } A:link, A:visited, A:active { text-decoration: underline; color: black; } A:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: #ff3300; } </style></p> <p>You have selected to pay by cheque. <br /> Please print the order shown below and send it with the payment to the address below :</p> <p><strong>NB_Store Demo</strong> <br /> Route de la Gare <br /> 12150</p> <p>The order will be validated when we recieve your payment and an confirmation email will be sent to you. <br /> If we don't recieve your payment within 7 working days, your order will automatically be cancelled.</p> <p>Thankyou.</p><p><p> <style type="text/css"> body table td { font-family: Trebuchet MS; font-size: 13px; color: black; } .emailheader { font-family: Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: #656565; } .cartheader { color: white; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; background-color: #656565; } A:link, A:visited, A:active { text-decoration: underline; color: black; } A:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: #ff3300; } </style> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table1"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="50%" valign="top"> <strong>Order Number :</strong> <br /> [Order:OrderNumber] <br /> <strong>Order Date :</strong> [Order:OrderDate] </td> <td width="50%" align="right"> <font class="emailheader"> ORDER </font> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table2"> <tbody> <tr> <td valign="top"> <p> <strong>Invoiced to :</strong> <br /> [BAddress:AddressName] <br /> [BAddress:Address1] <br /> [BAddress:Address2] <br /> [BAddress:PostalCode] [BAddress:City] <br /> [BAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [BAddress:Country] <br /> [BAddress:Phone1] <br /> [BAddress:Phone2] <br /> [OrderUser:Email] </p> </td> <td valign="top" align="right"> <strong>Deliver to :</strong> <br /> [SAddress:AddressName] <br /> [SAddress:Address1] <br /> [SAddress:Address2] <br /> [SAddress:PostalCode] [SAddress:City] <br /> [SAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [SAddress:Country] <br /> [SAddress:Phone1] <br /> [SAddress:Phone2] </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" border="0" id="Table3"> <tbody> <tr valign="top"> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> Description </td> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> Price </td> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> Qty </td> <td align="center" settingstext.chqpayment.text: <p>Vous avez choisi de régler votre commande par chèque.<br />Veuillez imprimer le bon de commande ci-dessous (ou dans l'e-mail qui vous a été envoyé) et joignez-le à votre chèque de paiement, envoyez le tout&#160;à l'adresse ci-dessous :</p><p><strong>SARL Mieu Païs</strong><br />Route de la Gare<br />12150 RECOULES PREVINQUIERES</p><p>La commande sera validée dès réception de votre courrier. Nous vous le notifierons à ce moment-là.<br />Si au-delà de cinq jours ouvrables après la commande nous n'avons toujours pas reçu votre courrier, votre commande sera automatiquement annulée.</p><p>Merci.</p><p>[Template:order.text.template]</p>

<p><style type="text/css"> body table td { font-family: Trebuchet MS; font-size: 13px; color: black; } .emailheader { font-family: Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: #656565; } .cartheader { color: white; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; background-color: #656565; } A:link, A:visited, A:active { text-decoration: underline; color: black; } A:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: #ff3300; } </style></p> <p>You have selected to pay by cheque. <br /> Please print the order shown below and send it with the payment to the address below :</p> <p><strong>NB_Store Demo</strong> <br /> Route de la Gare <br /> 12150</p> <p>The order will be validated when we recieve your payment and an confirmation email will be sent to you. <br /> If we don't recieve your payment within 7 working days, your order will automatically be cancelled.</p> <p>Thankyou.</p><p><p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table1"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="50%" valign="top"> <strong>Order Number :</strong> <br /> [Order:OrderNumber] <br /> <strong>Order DateÂ  :</strong> [Order:OrderDate] </td> <td width="50%" align="right"> <font class="nb_store_emailheader"> ORDER </font> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table2"> <tbody> <tr> <td valign="top"> <p> <strong>Invoiced to :</strong> <br /> [BAddress:AddressName] <br /> [BAddress:Address1] <br /> [BAddress:Address2] <br /> [BAddress:PostalCode] [BAddress:City] <br /> [BAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [BAddress:Country] <br /> [BAddress:Phone1] <br /> [BAddress:Phone2] <br /> [Order:Email] </p> <p> [OrderStatus:OrderStatusText] </p> </td> <td valign="top" align="right"> <strong>Deliver to :</strong> <br /> [SAddress:AddressName] <br /> [SAddress:Address1] <br /> [SAddress:Address2] <br /> [SAddress:PostalCode] [SAddress:City] <br /> [SAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [SAddress:Country] <br /> [SAddress:Phone1] <br /> [SAddress:Phone2] </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" border="0" id="Table3"> <tbody> <tr valign="top"> <td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader"> Description </td> <td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader"> Price </td> <td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader"> Qty </td> <td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader"> Total (â‚¬) </td> </tr> [Order:DetailRows] <tr> <td align="right" colspan="3"> Shipping </td> <td align="right"> [Order:ShippingCost] </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" colspan="3"> VAT </td> <td align="right"> [Order:AppliedTax] </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" colspan="3"> Discount </td> <td align="right"> <strong>[Order:Discount]</strong> </td> </tr> <tr> <td settingstext.colissimo.tracktemplate: Pour suivre l'&eacute;tat de votre colis <b>[TAG:TRACKINGCODE]</b> en temps r&eacute;el, <a href="http://www.coliposte.net/gp/services/main.jsp?m=10003005&colispart=[TAG:TRACKINGCODE]" target="_blank">cliquez-ici</a>.<br /><br />

settingstext.extradetail.text: <p>Informations supplémentaires / Message cadeau (Nous vous donnons la possibilité d'ajouter un message à l'attention du destinataire du cadeau) :</p>
settingstext.gatewaymsg.text: <p><strong>Paiement par carte bancaire&#160; :</strong><br />Sélectionnez SVP votre type de carte :</p>
<p><strong>Bank Card:</strong><br /> Please select your type of payment.</p>

settingstext.logintext.text: <p>Vous devez être identifié afin de procéder au paiement.</p> <p><table width="100%" border="0"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="50%" align="center">J'ai déjà un&#160;compte sur ce site :<br /> <a href="javascript:__doPostBack('dnn$dnnLOGIN$cmdLogin','')">Connexion</a></td> <td width="50%" align="center">Je n'ai pas de compte sur ce&#160;site :<br /> <a href="javascript:__doPostBack('dnn$dnnUSER$cmdRegister','')">Inscription</a></td> </tr> </tbody> </table></p>

<p>You must login to complete your order. </p> <p> <table width="100%" border="0"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="50%" align="center">I already have an account : <br /> <a href="javascript:__doPostBack('dnn$dnnLOGIN$cmdLogin','')">Connexion</a> </td> <td width="50%" align="center">I do NOT have an aaccount : <br /> <a href="javascript:__doPostBack('dnn$dnnUSER$cmdRegister','')">Inscription</a> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p>

} .cartheader { color: white; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; background-color: #656565; } A:link, A:visited, A:active { text-decoration: underline; color: black; } A:hover { text-decoration: underline; settingstext.order.text.template: <p><table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table1"><tbody><tr><td width="50%" valign="top"><strong>Num&eacute;ro Commande&nbsp;:</strong> <br />[Order:OrderNumber] <br /><strong>Date Commande&nbsp;:</strong> [Order:OrderDate]</td><td width="50%" align="right"><font class="nb_store_emailheader">COMMANDE </font></td></tr></tbody></table></p><p><table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table2"><tbody><tr><td valign="top"><strong>Facturer &agrave; :</strong> <br />[BAddress:AddressName] <br />[BAddress:Address1] <br />[BAddress:Address2] <br />[BAddress:PostalCode] [BAddress:City] <br />[BAddress:RegionCode] <br />[BAddress:Country] <br />[BAddress:Phone1] <br />[BAddress:Phone2]<br /> [OrderUser:Email]</td><td valign="top" align="right"><strong>Livrer &agrave; :</strong> <br />[SAddress:AddressName] <br />[SAddress:Address1] <br />[SAddress:Address2] <br />[SAddress:PostalCode] [SAddress:City] <br />[SAddress:RegionCode] <br />[SAddress:Country] <br />[SAddress:Phone1] <br />[SAddress:Phone2]</td></tr></tbody></table></p><p><table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" border="0" id="Table3"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader">D&eacute;signation</td><td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader">Prix</td><td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader">Qt&eacute;</td><td align="center" class="nb_store_cartheader">Total HT (&euro;)</td></tr>[Order:DetailRows]<tr><td align="right" colspan="3">Frais de port</td><td align="right">[Order:ShippingCost]</td></tr><tr><td align="right" colspan="3">Total</td><td align="right"><strong>[Order:Total]</strong></td></tr></tbody></table></p> <p> [Order:ShippingMethod] </p> <p> [Order:TrackingLink] </p> <p>Infos suppl&eacute;mentaires : [Order:NoteMsg]</p>

color: black; } A:hover { text-decoration: underline; color: #ff3300; } </style> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table1"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="50%" valign="top"> <strong>Order Number :</strong> <br /> [Order:OrderNumber] <br /> <strong>Order Date :</strong> [Order:OrderDate] </td> <td width="50%" align="right"> <font class="emailheader"> ORDER </font> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" id="Table2"> <tbody> <tr> <td valign="top"> <p> <strong>Invoiced to :</strong> <br /> [BAddress:AddressName] <br /> [BAddress:Address1] <br /> [BAddress:Address2] <br /> [BAddress:PostalCode] [BAddress:City] <br /> [BAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [BAddress:Country] <br /> [BAddress:Phone1] <br /> [BAddress:Phone2] <br /> [OrderUser:Email] </p> </td> <td valign="top" align="right"> <strong>Deliver to :</strong> <br /> [SAddress:AddressName] <br /> [SAddress:Address1] <br /> [SAddress:Address2] <br /> [SAddress:PostalCode] [SAddress:City] <br /> [SAddress:RegionCode] <br /> [SAddress:Country] <br /> [SAddress:Phone1] <br /> [SAddress:Phone2] </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p> <p> <table width="512" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" border="0" id="Table3"> <tbody> <tr valign="top"> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> Description </td> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> Price </td> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> Qty </td> <td align="center" class="cartheader"> Total (â‚¬) </td> </tr> [Order:DetailRows] <tr> <td align="right" colspan="3"> Shipping </td> <td align="right"> [Order:ShippingCost] </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" colspan="3"> VAT </td> <td align="right"> [Order:AppliedTax] </td> </tr> <tr> <td align="right" colspan="3"> Total </td> <td align="right"> <strong>[Order:Total]</strong> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </p> <p> [Order:ShippingMethod] </p> <p> [Order:TrackingLink] </p> <p> Extra Info : [Order:NoteMsg] </p></p>

settingstext.productlimit.text: <p><strong>Voua avez dépassé le nombre maximum de produits.</strong> <br />Pour ajouter un nouveau produit vous devez d'abord supprimer un produit existant.</p>
<strong>Product Limit has been Reached.</strong> <br /> To add a new product you must first remove an existing one.
settingstext.productlist2.template: <table width="100%" height="100" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0"> <tbody> <tr> <td width="100" height="100" align="center"> <a href="[TAG:LINK]">[TAG:IMAGE]</a></td> <td width="100%" valign="top"> <h1>[TAG:EDITLINK][TAG:SUMMARY]</h1> <font color="#7B7B7B">A partir de :</font> <strong>[TAG:BESTPRICE] &#8364; TTC</strong> <font color="#7B7B7B"><em>selon disponibilit&#233;</em></font></td> <td valign="top" align="center"> <h2>[TAG:MANUFACTURER]</h2> </td> <td valign="top" align="center"> <h2>[TAG:PRODUCTREF]</h2> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
settingstext.replaceCSV.ImportMapping: <root> <item col="8" str="," rpl="." substr="true"/> <item col="9" str="," rpl="." substr="true"/> <item col="8" str=" " rpl="" substr="true"/> <item col="9" str=" " rpl="" substr="true"/> <item col="*" str="&amp;" rpl="et" substr="true"/> </root>
settingstext.specialshipping.text: <p> Votre commande nécessite une livraison spéciale. <br /> Veuillez prendre contact avec nous à l'adresse e-mail ci-dessous, afin de finaliser votre commande : </p> <p> <strong>[TAG:STOREEMAIL]</strong> <br /> </p> <p> En vous remerciant </p>

NB_Store_SQLReportInfo.SQL: select top 10 OrderDate,OrderNumber,AddressName as [Name],convert(decimal(16,2),Total) As Total, OrderStatusText as Status from dbo.NB_Store_Orders as O inner join dbo.NB_Store_OrderStatus as OS on OS.OrderStatusID = O.OrderStatusID and Lang= 'XX' inner join dbo.NB_Store_Address as AD on AD.AddressID = O.BillingAddressID where OrderNumber != '' and O.PortalID = @PortalID order by OrderDate Desc
select count(OrderID) as [Order Count] from dbo.NB_Store_Orders where PortalID = @PortalID and OrderNumber != ''
select convert(decimal(16,2),sum(Total)) as [Order Total] from dbo.NB_Store_Orders where Portalid = @PortalID and OrderNumber != ''
select count(ProductID) as [Product Count] from dbo.NB_Store_Products where Archived = 0 and IsDeleted = 0 and PortalID = @PortalID
